home.mureCoreDesc: Continuous learning engine for AI-assisted development. Let AI remember your patterns and sync across tools.

products.title: Products
products.heroDesc:
Learn once, remember forever.
Sync your development patterns across Claude, Gemini, Copilot, and more.

problem.title: The Problem

repeating.title: Repeating Yourself
repeating.desc: Every new AI session starts from zero. You explain the same patterns, preferences, and workarounds again and again.

fragmentation.title: Tool Fragmentation
fragmentation.desc: You use Claude for complex tasks, Gemini for quick questions, Copilot in VS Code. Knowledge doesn't transfer between them.

tokens.title: Wasted Tokens
tokens.desc: Stuffing context with documentation burns tokens. Your AI spends capacity reading instead of thinking.

problem.solution: MURE Core solves all of this.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to supercharge your AI workflow

learn.title: Learn
learn.desc: MURE extracts patterns from your coding sessions automatically. Debug techniques, workarounds, best practices‚Äîall captured.

sync.title: Sync
sync.desc: Push learned patterns to all your AI tools. Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Auggie, Codex‚Äîone command updates them all.

search.title: Search
search.desc: Find relevant patterns using semantic search. MURE understands context, not just keywords.

crossCli.title: Cross-CLI Sync
crossCli.desc: Patterns learned in Claude Code automatically sync to Gemini CLI, Auggie, and more. Configure once, apply everywhere. Your knowledge follows you across every tool.

semanticSearch.title: Semantic Search
semanticSearch.desc: Find patterns using natural language. Powered by local embeddings (Ollama). No cloud required.

patternLearning.title: Pattern Learning
patternLearning.desc: Auto-extract reusable patterns from transcripts. Debug techniques, workarounds, all captured.

tierLoading.title: 3-Tier Loading
tierLoading.desc: Smart token management: metadata (100 tokens), instructions (<5k), resources (on-demand). 97% savings.

teamSharing.title: Team Sharing
teamSharing.desc: Share patterns via Git or cloud sync. New team members inherit collective knowledge instantly.

smartRouting.title: Smart Routing
smartRouting.desc: Route simple questions to free tools, complex tasks to paid ones. Save money without sacrificing quality.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: All data stays on your machine. Cloud sync is encrypted at rest and in transit. You own your patterns.

hooks.title: Hook Integration
hooks.desc: Inject relevant patterns on every prompt. Seamless integration with Claude Code hooks system.

tools.title: Works With Your Favorite Tools
tools.subtitle: MURE Core integrates seamlessly with all major AI coding assistants

solo.title: Solo Developers
solo.desc: Stop repeating yourself. Teach your AI once, use everywhere. Build up a personal knowledge base that grows with you.

team.title: Engineering Teams
team.desc: Share patterns across your team. Onboard new developers instantly with collective knowledge. Standardize AI interactions.

org.title: Organizations
org.desc: Enforce coding standards through AI. Distribute approved patterns. Track and audit AI-assisted development.

testimonial.quote: "I was spending 20% of my Claude tokens just re-explaining our codebase patterns. MURE Core cut that to near zero."
testimonial.author: ‚Äî Early Beta User

cta.title: Ready to supercharge your AI workflow?
cta.subtitle: Start free. No credit card required. Upgrade when you need more.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more.

downgrade.q: What happens to my patterns if I downgrade?
downgrade.a: Your patterns are always yours. If you exceed the free tier limit, you'll still have read access to all patterns, but won't be able to add new ones until you upgrade or delete some.

security.a: Absolutely. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit (HTTPS). We never access your patterns without explicit permission.

enterprise.title: Need a custom solution?
enterprise.desc: Enterprise plans with custom integrations, on-premise deployment, and dedicated support.

about.title: About ZHYU
about.tagline: Profession ¬∑ Speed ¬∑ Quality ¬∑ Passion is our 4 core spirit
about.taglineEn: Profession, Quick, Quality & Passion is our 4 core spirit.
about.history:
Zhao Yue Tech was founded in 2005, initially focusing on enterprise websites and multimedia development, earning high praise in the industry and becoming long-term partners.

Through software quality control and self-developed platforms, our team can quickly deliver quality system software. With domain expertise and continuous R&D investment, we continue to grow stronger.

In 2026, we launched MURE Core ‚Äî a continuous learning engine for AI-assisted development, helping developers let AI remember their patterns and sync across tools.

profession.title: Profession
profession.desc: Software requires high expertise. Beyond basic skills, we emphasize good development practices and design patterns.

quick.title: Speed
quick.desc: We understand businesses value speed. We invest in building our own development tools and platforms to accelerate project delivery.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: By using our self-developed tools and platforms, we ensure consistent quality control across all projects.

passion.title: Passion
passion.desc: Software makes the world more convenient. We hope everyone at Zhao Yue Tech treats themselves and others with passion.

future.title: Future Outlook
future.desc: We will invest more resources in AI development tools and cloud services, continuing to build products that make developers more efficient.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or partnership inquiries? Get in touch with us.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send. Please try again.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to MUR Core and the services provided by Zhao Yue Tech. Inc.Ltd. ("Company", "we", "us", or "our"). By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms").

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using MUR Core software, website, or any related services (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Services.

description.title: 2. Description of Services
description.content: MUR Core is a software tool that helps developers manage and synchronize development patterns across multiple AI coding assistants. The Services include:
items: MUR Core CLI software
Cloud synchronization features (for paid plans)
Team collaboration features (for team plans)
Related documentation and support

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: To access certain features of the Services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
items: Use the Services for any illegal purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Services
Interfere with or disrupt the Services
Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the software (except as permitted by law)
Resell or redistribute the Services without authorization

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The Services and all related intellectual property rights are owned by Zhao Yue Tech. Inc.Ltd. The open-source components of MUR Core are licensed under the MIT License. Your patterns and data remain your property.

payment.title: 6. Payment Terms
items: Fees are charged in advance on a monthly or annual basis
All fees are non-refundable except as stated in our Refund Policy
We may change prices with 30 days notice
You are responsible for any applicable taxes

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time for violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Services will cease immediately. You may export your data before termination.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: IN NO EVENT SHALL ZHAO YUE TECH. INC.LTD. BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Taiwan (R.O.C.), without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Taipei, Taiwan.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the Services. Continued use of the Services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Zhao Yue Tech. Inc.Ltd. ("Company", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use MUR Core and related services.

provided.title: Information You Provide
items: Account Information: Name, email address, and password when you create an account
Payment Information: Billing details processed by our payment provider (we do not store credit card numbers)
Support Communications: Information you provide when contacting support

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
items: Usage Data: Features used, commands run, error logs (anonymized)
Device Information: Operating system, browser type, IP address
Cookies: Session cookies for authentication

notCollect.title: Information We Do NOT Collect
items: Your source code
Your pattern content (stored locally by default)
Your AI conversation history

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our Services
Process transactions and send related information
Send technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
Detect and prevent fraud or abuse

cloudSync.title: 3. Cloud Sync Feature
cloudSync.content: If you enable cloud sync (Pro and Team plans):
items: Your patterns are encrypted at rest and in transit
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data
You can delete all cloud data at any time

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
items: Service Providers: Companies that help us operate our services (hosting, payment processing, analytics)
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
Business Transfers: In connection with a merger or acquisition

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures including:
items: Encryption of data in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
Encryption of data at rest
Regular security audits
Access controls and authentication

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Delete your account and data
Export your data
Opt out of marketing communications

international.title: 8. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Services are not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: At Zhao Yue Tech. Inc.Ltd., we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase of MUR Core services. This Refund Policy outlines the terms and conditions for refunds.

eligibility.title: 1. Refund Eligibility
eligibility.content: We offer refunds under the following circumstances:

eligible.title: Eligible for Refund:
items: Accidental duplicate purchases
Technical issues that prevent use of the service (if unresolved by our support team)
Service not as described

notEligible.title: Not Eligible for Refund:
items: Accounts terminated for Terms of Service violations
Partial month refunds for monthly subscriptions canceled mid-cycle
Custom enterprise agreements (subject to individual contract terms)
Change of mind after extended use of the service

howTo.title: 2. How to Request a Refund
items: Email us at support@zhyu.com.tw
Include your account email and order number
Describe the reason for your refund request
howTo.response: We will review your request and respond within 5-10 business days. Approved refunds will be credited to the original payment method.

cancellation.title: 3. Subscription Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time:
cancellation.monthly: Monthly Plans: Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period. No refund for the remaining days.
cancellation.annual: Annual Plans: You can continue using the service until the end of the annual period.

prorated.title: 4. Prorated Refunds
prorated.content: In certain circumstances, we may offer prorated refunds at our discretion:
items: Extended service outages (more than 24 hours)
Removal of features you specifically purchased for
Other exceptional circumstances

freeTrial.title: 5. Free Trial
freeTrial.content: Our free tier does not require payment. If you upgrade to a paid plan and are not satisfied, please contact our support team to discuss your options.

currency.title: 6. Currency and Fees
items: Refunds are processed in the original currency of purchase
We do not charge any fees for processing refunds
Your bank or payment provider may have their own fees for international transactions

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Refund Policy, please contact us:

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We believe in our product and want you to succeed. If you're having trouble getting value from MUR Core, please reach out to our support team before requesting a refund. We're happy to help you get the most out of our service.
